title: What's the Simulation?
question_text: A $6$-sided die was rolled $100$ times with answers recorded in order. These answers were examined $2$ at a time, and each time a pair contained the same number, this was noted. The number of pairs with the same set of numbers was then divided by $50$ and given as a probability estimate. This simulation describes which of the following situations?

choices.text:
For a statistics project, a student randomly selected
100
students and asked their gender. Then the students' grade point averages were split evenly into
6
groups. The student wanted to estimate the probability of finding two of the same gender in the same grade point average group.
